publications: [{"title":"AbuseAnalyzer: Abuse Detection, Severity and Target Prediction for Gab Posts","subtitle":"Conference on Computational Linguistics (COLING) 2020","date":"October 1, 2020","description":"Developed and analyzed a corpus which categorizes social media posts based on the severity and target of abuse. Analyzed a transformer-based text classifier that gives an accuracy of ~80 % for detecting the presence of abuse, ~82 % for detecting the target of abuse, and ~64 % for detecting the severity of abuse."}]
